listened.title: Random Access Memories
listened.description: An exceptional album - I love everything about it. A complete no skip, this album has followed me for so many years that I've ended up associating more than one song with an old crush... My personnal favorite.

to_listen.title: Don't Tap the Glass
to_listen.description: Tyler's latest album, didn't take the time to listen to it yet but I love his music so I hope it will be great.
